sentences: Tal ükskõik, kes võimul on, peaasi, et elada lastaks.
Olen tema pärast valmis tegema ükskõik mida.
Heameelega läheks ta siit ükskõik kuhu – igal pool on parem.
context: The Estonian word 'ükskõik' is an adverb that serves two main functions: 1) It indicates indifference or lack of concern about a situation (equivalent to 'I don't care'), as in 'Mulle pole ükskõik, mis meie riigist saab' (It doesn't matter to me what becomes of our country). 2) When followed by interrogative words like kes (who), mis (what), milline (which), kus (where), etc., it forms expressions meaning 'any' or 'whichever', as in 'Ükskõik mis ma talle ei räägiks, ta ei usuks mind' (Whatever I tell him, he won't believe me).
